description: I'm Luke, a Swedish guy that used to be Welsh. I moved to Sweden in 2010 and haven't really looked back. I live in Stockholm with my partner and our young son. Recently I decided on a career change and wanted to move in to something that has always been an interes, working with computers. Now with no experience or knowledge in coding bar a some half worked through Udemy courses I signed up for a Fullstack devleoper course at Craft Academy. And started my three month intensive journey to become a web developer.

Streaming is something I took up about a year ago. With my current studies going on I haven't done much. Saying that I am thinking to stream some of the coding I'll be doing. If you interested drop by: https://www.twitch.tv/welshthor
